==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|神|巫}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|みこ}}

# {{ja-def|巫女}} An [[unmarried]] woman who [[serve]]s at a [[Shintō]] [[shrine]]; an [[unmarried]] woman who serves a [[deity]] as a [[medium]] to [[convey]] [[oracle]]s.

====Usage notes====
The spelling {{lang|ja|神巫}} is quite rare. The term ''miko'' is most commonly spelled as {{l|ja|巫女}} in modern Japanese, and less commonly as {{l|ja|神子}}.
